 2018-13912018-11-08
ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of Absence to the Hon. Todd Ducharme
PrecisGranting of a leave of absence to the Hon. TODD DUCHARME, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, from August 15 to October 15, 2018, on account of ill-health.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
